mapper.select: SELECT max(asol.line_num) FROM aatn_scrap_order_line asol WHERE asol.scrap_header_id = #{scrapOrderHeaderId}

SELECT asol.line_num, CONCAT(CONCAT(asoh.scrap_num,'-'),asol.line_num) line_num_display, asol.scrap_line_id, asol.scrap_header_id, asol.asset_id, asset.asset_name, asset.asset_desc, asol.process_status, asol.current_asset_status_id, current_asset_status.sys_status_name current_asset_status, asol.target_asset_status_id, target_asset_status.sys_status_name target_asset_status, asol.current_location_id, currentasl.location_name current_location_name, asol.target_location_id, currentasl.location_name target_location_name, asol.original_cost, asol.remain_cost, asol.capitalization_date, asol.remain_depreciation_mouth, asol.scrap_type_code, asol.description, asol.remark, asol.dispose_type_code, asol.tenant_id, asol.object_version_number FROM aatn_scrap_order_line asol LEFT JOIN aafm_asset asset ON ( asset.asset_id = asol.asset_id ) LEFT JOIN aafm_asset_status current_asset_status ON ( current_asset_status.asset_status_id = asol.current_asset_status_id ) LEFT JOIN aafm_asset_status target_asset_status ON ( target_asset_status.asset_status_id = asol.target_asset_status_id ) LEFT JOIN amdm_asset_locations currentasl ON ( currentasl.asset_location_id = asol.current_location_id ) LEFT JOIN amdm_asset_locations targetasl ON ( targetasl.asset_location_id = asol.target_location_id ) LEFT JOIN aatn_scrap_order_header asoh ON (asoh.scrap_header_id=asol.scrap_header_id) WHERE 1=1 AND asol.scrap_header_id = #{scrapOrderHeaderId} AND asol.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
